procedural_fairness: Initial motions by defendants were granted by Senior Prothonotary. Plaintiffs appealed, leading to this decision reviewing the motions and orders.
technical_details: Personal liability for corporate torts requires knowing, wilful participation
appeal_outcome: The appeal to reinstate the claim against Andre Teasdale was dismissed. The order for particulars regarding other licensees was overturned, but the order for particulars on inducement was upheld.
cause_of_action: Plaintiffs alleged patent infringement by defendants, including individual liability of Andre Teasdale
